title: Textile, 9th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: circular textile, appliqué
description: Large rounded applique in cream and two shades of blue. Border design includes stylized forms and small discs, one of which retains red color. Center medallion is blue with pattern suggesting leaves or wings reserved in cream ground; plus remains of inserts of white, blue and red silk are visible.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 9th century.Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: circular textile, appliqué. 1957-131-1.
